Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Feb 2019Hi,You may want to consider to stick with simple recurring business as commodities are usually cycle in nature and it required a lot of market "know how" to time it. Unless you are in the industry if not my suggestion is to stay away from it. 0 comments0
